meanings.definition: Ecumenicists: Those who promote unity among different Christian denominations.
meanings.sent1: The ecumenicists organized a joint prayer service for all the churches in the town.
meanings.sent2: Many ecumenicists work tirelessly to bridge the gaps between various Christian groups.
meanings.sent3: The ecumenicists decided to host a potluck to bring all the church members together.
meanings.sent4: In their efforts, the ecumenicists act as the glue that holds the diverse Christian community together.
meanings.sent5: The image of the ecumenicists joining hands in prayer symbolizes their mission of unity.

meanings.definition: Ecumenicists: Advocates for worldwide Christian unity and cooperation.
meanings.sent1: The ecumenicists traveled around the world to spread their message of unity among Christians.
meanings.sent2: Global ecumenicists believe in the power of collaboration to strengthen the Christian faith globally.
meanings.sent3: At the international conference, the ecumenicists shared stories of successful unity initiatives.
meanings.sent4: The ecumenicists' vision of a united global church shines brightly in their tireless efforts.
meanings.sent5: The ecumenicists' passion for worldwide Christian unity is truly inspiring.
